summary:
Achilles is a kind Male Khajiit, he's using his Bow to hunt down his prey.
His claws are pretty useful in man to man combat. Also, he's wearing no shoes, because paws don't make noises. :3
Sometimes he sneaks into homes, stealing Jewellery and selling it.
All my Followers have an Schlongs of Skyrim support.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Courier New][size=3][img]http://i.imgur.com/kVpd45U.jpg[/img]

He CAN'T be married, because of his Khajiit Voice
